author: p0W3RH311
body: its possible to add time of error property to $error variable. this value must be important in logging and is useful

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: PowerShell logging uses ETW and already has timestamps.

comments.author: BrucePay
comments.body: What @iSazonov  said :-) `$error` is intended to be an short-term _ephemeral_ in-memory logging facility. The event log and ETW are for more durable, time-stamped logging.
